page.title: 19LOG BOOK ENTRY.WILDEN SCHOOL
page.content: {WILDEN LOWER SCHOOL. }24.5.85. Back to school. 19+2 on roll. 12.6. Older children taken to Wilden church re-Domesday project. 19.6. Governors meeting in evening. 21.6. Boiler serviced. 28.6. Open evening. All parents kept their appointments. 4.7. Grass cut at last! First time since May. 5.7. Joint Sports Day.(Ravensden, Colmworth, and Wilden) At Rav'n this year. A most enjoyable day. 10.7. End-of-Term Assembly. 10am. Our theme this year was "TIME". Well attended by Governors, parents, and friends. Chrissie played for us. Presentations followed. Five children won places in the Trust schools this year. Prizes for other leavers.Swimming awards. 11.7. Grass cut.....AGAIN?!!.......
